name: spective
description: A simple way to create 2D graphics in your browser.
author: triplett

scripts.build: rimraf dist && esbuild src/main.js --outfile=dist/spective.min.js --bundle --minify --banner:js=//spective@v3.0.2 --legal-comments=linked && esbuild src/module.js --outfile=dist/spective.min.mjs --format=esm --bundle --minify --banner:js=//spective@v3.0.2 --legal-comments=linked
